metadata.title: Changelog Entry - Comprehensive Execution Plan and Standards Creation
metadata.purpose: Document the creation of comprehensive execution plan and standards for kOS kitchen system

files_created.description: Comprehensive execution plan with 5 phases for building the kOS kitchen system
files_created.impact: CRITICAL - Defines the entire build process

files_created.description: Mandatory workflow standards for all agents working on the kitchen system
Comprehensive development standards for code quality and organization
Architecture standards for system design and scalability
Comprehensive best practices guide for development

files_modified.description: Updated handoff document to reflect new execution plan and standards
changes: Updated next agent tasks to follow new standards
Added references to all new standards documents
Updated success criteria to match new requirements
files_modified.impact: HIGH - Provides clear guidance for next agent

summary.work_accomplished: Created comprehensive execution plan and standards for the kOS kitchen system build
key_achievements: Defined 5-phase execution plan with clear priorities
Established mandatory workflow standards for all agents
Created comprehensive development and architecture standards
Ensured quality-first approach with no technical debt
summary.impact: CRITICAL - Provides foundation for systematic, high-quality system build
summary.next_steps: Begin Phase 1.1: Pantry Core System implementation following new standards

quality_assurance.usability: All documents ready for immediate use
